CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto speaker phone
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turn speaker phone on in calls whenever phone is moved away from face.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Non-uniform boost
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When boosting, this improves voice audibility and MAY help decrease the danger to the speakers from boosting the sound by boosting mainly mid and high level frequencies. Normally leave this checked.
